name: Horror survival (alpha prototype)
description:
For now you are able to walk around in the world.
Equip some weapons.
Have a look at the atmosphere and die.

This is a very early look at a survival horror game I have been planning for a long time.

-----NEW UPDATES-----
- Enemies (AI needs improvement), who will chase you, attack you, search for you
- Weapons you can pick up (E) and equip from your inventory (I)

-----PLANNED-----
- More atmosphere (lights, environment, sounds, music)
- More worldbuilding (more worlds to visit and fill the current map with treasures, traps and dangers)
- Puzzles and quests
- survival elements like food and health, maybe even a colony you need to provide for.
- Loads of more to come...
